description: cmd/5l: reestablish uniform union field naming

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM.

btw, at least the C99 standard permits this kind of self-referential
in macro replacement text, why are we so strict about this?
(without it, a lot of program will be broken, for example,
#define char unsigned char
)

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d2c456987a26 ***

cmd/5l: reestablish uniform union field naming

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
